location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several small holes, however the text remains legible on the whole.

mods.abstract: Covering letter that states that recently received correspondence from Persia including a letter from Carim Cahn [Karim Khan] and a phirmaund [firman] to Sadoo Cahn [Sadiq Khan] for the security of English effects at Bussora, were enclosed with it. These documents are not contained in the file.
